title: La Última Pasión
description: Nothing can come between Gabriella and Juan, except maybe… his twin brother, Pablo! But última pasión can only belong to one.
altHero: Gabriella in a red dress next to Juan in a white shirt
alt1: Gabriella looks away as Juan approaches her
alt2: Pablo, Juan’s twin, pulls off a false mustache
alt3: Gabriella hands weapons to Juan and Pablo
alt4: Juan holds up a mini crossbow
